name: SleepBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Sleep Buddy When should I go to bed to wake up at 6:00 AM.”
”Alexa, ask Sleep Buddy when should I wake up if I go to bed at 10:00 PM.”
”Alexa, ask Sleep Buddy when should I go to bed to wake up at 7:00 AM.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep buddy
des:
Sleep Buddy uses the properties of REM sleep to determine the best time for you to go to sleep or wake up to feel well rested. 

Try asking Alexa the following:

"Alexa, ask Sleep Buddy when should I go to sleep to wake up at 6:00 AM?"
"Alexa, ask Sleep Buddy when should I wake up if I go to sleep at 9:00 PM?"

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
